amendment.description: To strike a provision relating to delayed implementation of the supplemental nutrition assistance program matching funds requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2849 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 369.

action.text: Amendment SA 2849 proposed by Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 2848.
